thread.title: Richard Gadze's debut goal in Indian top-flight hands Delhi Dynamos win
thread.title_full: Richard Gadze's debut goal in Indian top-flight hands Delhi Dynamos win

title: Richard Gadze's debut goal in Indian top-flight hands Delhi Dynamos win
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 22:40 CET Richard Gadze's debut goal in Indian top-flight hands Delhi Dynamos win - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghanaian striker Richard Gadze's first goal in the Indian Super League helped Delhi Dynamos to beat Pune City 2-1 on the road on Tuesday. 
Gadze was a stoppage time substitute for Brazilian midfielder Gustavo Marmentini and doubled their lead in the 97 th minute. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
